context: A global city, Boston is placed <a0_0>among the top 30<a0_0/> most economically powerful cities in the world. Encompassing <a1_0>$363 billion<a1_0/>, the Greater Boston metropolitan area has the <a2_0>sixth-largest<a2_0/> economy in the country and <a3_0>12th-largest<a3_0/> in the world.
